task.title: Removing Tires
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step instructions for safely removing a tire using tire irons.

prereq.p: Ensure you have the following tools:

step.cmd: Jack up the wheel clear of the road

substep.cmd: Push the valve stem into the tire until its bead is flush with the rim

step.cmd: Loosen the tire bead by hand
step.info: Work and push with your hands to loosen the head of the shoe in the clinch of the rim

substep.cmd: Insert the first tire iron under the beads
substep.info: Push in just enough to get a good hold, but not so far as to pinch the inner tube

substep.cmd: Insert the second iron seven to eight inches from the first
Insert the third iron seven to eight inches from the second

step.cmd: Pry the tire over the clinch using the three levers
step.info: Use your knee to hold down one lever while manipulating the other two

step.cmd: Remove the outer edge of the casing by hand

taskbody.result: The tire is now ready for tube replacement or repair.

postreq.p: When replacing the inner tube, always use plenty of soapstone.
